steps.reproduction: Navigate to "https://telex.hu" using functions.browser_navigate, then save a snapshot of the page with functions.browser_snapshot_and_save.

Take a snapshot of the page using browser_snapshot_and_save, evaluate to find an element with class "leader" and get the href of the contained anchor, then navigate browser to the found href using browser_evaluate and browser_navigate.

steps.instruction: Output the title of the article, and finish
steps.reproduction: Take a page snapshot with browser_snapshot_and_save, filter for role "heading" with snapshot_get_and_filter, and extract text from the level 1 heading element.
